data.comment: The first-half is under way at Arena Fonte Nova - Bahia kick-off to start the match.
Bruno Arleu signals a free kick to Bahia in their own half.
In the minute 2, Palmeiras awarded a free kick in their own half.
Bahia awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick for Bahia in their own half.
In the minute 4, Bruno Arleu signals a Palmeiras throw-in in Bahia's half.
Palmeiras's Rony is whistled for offside at Arena Fonte Nova.
Bahia drive upfield and Rodriguinho gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Palmeiras defender.
In the minute 6, Corner awarded to Bahia.
Palmeiras awarded a free kick in their own half.
Bahia have been awarded a corner by Bruno Arleu.
In the minute 8, Bahia to take a throw-in in Palmeiras territory.
The match at Arena Fonte Nova has been interrupted briefly for a check on Rossi, who is down injured.
Rossi has recovered and rejoins the match in Salvador.
In the minute 11, Gregore (Bahia) has been booked and will miss the next match due to a suspension.
Free kick for Palmeiras in their own half.
Palmeiras are coming forward and Lucas Lima gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 15, Bruno Arleu awards Bahia a goal kick.
Bruno Arleu signals a free kick to Bahia in their own half.
Throw-in for Palmeiras in the half of Bahia.
In the minute 17, Willian (Palmeiras) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
Corner awarded to Palmeiras.
Bahia have a goal kick.
In the minute 19, Free kick Palmeiras.
Throw-in high up the field for Palmeiras in Salvador.
Free kick for Palmeiras in the half of Bahia.
In the minute 23, Palmeiras pushes forward through Rony, whose finish on goal is saved.
Bahia have been awarded a corner by Bruno Arleu.
Important block from the Palmeiras defence as Nino Paraiba fires in a strike for Bahia.
In the minute 25, Throw-in for Bahia at Arena Fonte Nova.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Salvador.
Bruno Arleu signals a free kick to Palmeiras in their own half.
In the minute 27, Ball safe as Bahia is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Goal kick for Bahia at Arena Fonte Nova.
Throw-in Palmeiras.
In the minute 30, Palmeiras's Willian breaks free at Arena Fonte Nova. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Ball goes out of play for a Bahia goal kick.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 31, Throw-in for Bahia in their own half.
Bruno Arleu awards the home team a throw-in.
Corner awarded to Bahia.
In the minute 33, Lucas Lima is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
Palmeiras's Lucas Lima looks ok and returns to the pitch.
Bruno Arleu signals a free kick to Bahia.
Bahia's Gilberto is back in action after a slight knock.
In the minute 36, Bruno Arleu waits before resuming play because Gilberto for Bahia is still down.
Bahia have been awarded a corner by Bruno Arleu.
In the minute 38, Bahia have been awarded a corner by Bruno Arleu.
Throw-in for Palmeiras at Arena Fonte Nova.
Bruno Arleu awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 39, Throw-in for Palmeiras in the half of Bahia.
Attention is being given to Bahiaâ€™s Rossi and play has been suspended briefly.
Bruno Arleu blows against Palmeiras's Gabriel Menino for offside.
In the minute 42, Rossi returns to the field for Bahia after picking up a slight injury.
Palmeiras to take a throw-in in Bahia territory.
Free kick for Palmeiras in their own half.
In the minute 45, At Arena Fonte Nova the fourth official shows that 3 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
Ball safe as Bahia is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In Salvador a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Bahia awarded a free kick in their own half.
Bahia's Rodriguinho gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Palmeiras defender.
In the minute 45, The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
In the minute 45, Rossi (Bahia) has received a first yellow card.
Bruno Arleu blows to start the second-half. Palmeiras with the kick-off.
Throw-in Bahia.
In the minute 47, Bruno Arleu signals a free kick to Bahia in their own half.
Rossi of Bahia is pulled up for offside.
Throw-in for Bahia in their own half.
In the minute 52, Bruno Arleu signals a Bahia throw-in in Palmeiras's half.
Ball goes out of play for a Bahia goal kick.
Willian for the away team is judged to be offside.
In the minute 55, Can Palmeiras get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Bahia's half?
Corner awarded to Palmeiras.
Free kick Bahia.
In the minute 57, Free kick for Palmeiras in their own half.
Bahia awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Bahia have been awarded a corner by Bruno Arleu.
In the minute 59, Bruno Arleu awards the away team a throw-in.
Palmeiras have a dangerous throw-in.
Throw-in for Bahia in their own half.
In the minute 63, Ball safe as Bahia is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Elber of Bahia gets in a strike, but is off target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Salvador.
In the minute 64, Palmeiras awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in Bahia.
Palmeiras awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 66, Free kick for Bahia in the half of Palmeiras.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Salvador to check on Mayke, who is grimacing with pain.
The away team have replaced Rony with Wesley. This is the first substitution made today by Vanderlei Luxemburgo.
In the minute 68, Vanderlei Luxemburgo (Palmeiras) is making a second substitution, with Ramires replacing Bruno Henrique.
Mayke is back on his feet again.
Luiz Adriano is replacing Willian for Palmeiras at Arena Fonte Nova.
In the minute 70, Bruno Arleu signals a free kick to Bahia in their own half.
Corner awarded to Bahia.
Bruno Arleu signals a throw-in for Palmeiras, close to Bahia's area.
In the minute 73, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Bruno Arleu signals a free kick to Palmeiras.
In the minute 74, Ze Rafael is replacing Lucas Lima for Palmeiras at Arena Fonte Nova.
The away team have replaced Gabriel Menino with Gustavo Scarpa. This is the fifth substitution made today by Vanderlei Luxemburgo.
In the minute 75, Throw-in for Bahia at Arena Fonte Nova.
Roger Machado (Bahia) is making a first substitution, with Saldanha replacing Gilberto.
Roger Machado is making the team's second substitution at Arena Fonte Nova with Ronaldo replacing Rossi.
Palmeiras drives forward and Wesley gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 77, Free kick for Bahia in their own half.
Ze Rafael is on target to give Palmeiras a 0-1 advantage.
Gustavo Scarpa instrumental with a fine assist.
In the minute 78, Bahia make their third substitution with Clayson replacing Daniel.
Goal kick for Bahia at Arena Fonte Nova.
In the minute 79, In Salvador a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Marco Antonio is replacing Rodriguinho for the home team.
Free kick for Bahia in the half of Palmeiras.
Palmeiras awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 82, Bruno Arleu awards the home team a throw-in.
Palmeiras awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Palmeiras advance rapidly upfield but Bruno Arleu blows for offside.
In the minute 84, In Salvador, Gregore of Bahia is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Ball safe as Palmeiras is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Palmeiras at Arena Fonte Nova.
In the minute 86, Bruno Arleu signals a Bahia throw-in in Palmeiras's half.
Free kick Bahia.
Clayson (Bahia) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
In the minute 88, Palmeiras awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Palmeiras in the half of Bahia.
Palmeiras to take a throw-in in Bahia territory.
6 minutes will be added to the 2nd half in Salvador.
Palmeiras push forward at Arena Fonte Nova and Ze Rafael gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Bahia defence.
Important block from the Bahia defence as Luiz Adriano fires in a strike for Palmeiras.
Bruno Arleu signals a free kick to Bahia in their own half.
Free kick for Palmeiras in their own half.
Bruno Arleu signals a free kick to Bahia.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Bahia close to the penalty box.
Can Bahia get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Palmeiras's half?
7 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
The match is over. Final score 1-1.
Luan Garcia is booked for the away team.
At Arena Fonte Nova, Wesley has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Goal! Bahia go level at 1-1 through Marco Antonio in Salvador.
